subject: Our Ref: ATM /CDT/CET
body:
Our Ref: ATM /CDT/CET
Reg. Order No:FEC/IMFFI231282.
FMF CODE 0989.
Attention: The Beneficiary,
We have been instructed to contact you, following the Federal Executive Council and the International Monetary fund meeting this morning which resolved that the Federal Government of Benin will pay a compensation sum of US$15.5M to you and the payment should be made through our partner financial institution via Automated Teller Machine{ATM} Card.
This resolution was made following series of allegations from foreign beneficiaries that they had been swindled by some hoodlums of their hard earned money running into thousands of dollars.
In effort to curtail this trend, it was resolved by the Federal Executive Council to make your payment through a separate financial institution that is not Central Bank of Benin because of some inherent financial difficulties made possible by the statutory provision regulating the functions of the Economic Community of West African states {ECOWAS} Central Banks in matters of retail banking.
Owing to the urgent need to expedite action in the immediate transfer of your compensation sum, you are hereby officially informed that we have verified your payment file and have found out that you have not received your compensation amount of US$15.5M through the interswitch ATM Card procedure.
Consequently, 
you are required to forward to us the following information:
Your receiving name and address:
Direct telephone number:
Age:
Occupation:
ID Card
:  
send all the delivery address to this email at : 
emmanuelanthony011@yahoo.com
YOU WILL CONTACT AGENT ON WHATSAPP. +22954538741
Note: In our next mail we will instruct you on how you will operate your ATM Card in any ATM machine around you or any bank around you to cash your funds.
Best Regards,
Rev Emmanuel Anthony
Director Interswitch, UBA PLC,

subject: Re: Our Ref: ATM /CDT/CET
body:
Hello Rev Emmanuel Anthony,

Thank you for reaching out to me. I'm quite surprised by this news, but it's also very exciting! Could you please provide more details about this? How did the Federal Government of Benin come to decide on paying me this sum? 

Also, could you explain a bit more about the ATM Card procedure? I'm not very familiar with it. And what is the role of the agent that I need to contact on WhatsApp?

Looking forward to your response.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Eric

subject: Re: Our Ref: ATM /CDT/CET
body:
CONTACT EMAIL ADDRESS/ ubabankplc2019@accountant.com

Attention:

Thanks for your message, Yes indeed, we received an instruction from the Ministry of Finance, Federal Republic of Benin and the Chairman Federal Reserve Board Atlanta Georgian to deliver your Approved payment of $15.5Million US Dollars ATM VISA CARD to you which you will use to withdraw this your US$15.5Million Dollars from any ATM Machine there in your city.

Your ATM VISA CARD number 5267 3700 0265 8619; has been approved by UBA Bank Plc and upgraded in your favor. The amount upgraded in your ATM CARD is the total US$15.5Million Dollars but your ATM secret pin number of the ATM CARD will be sending to you as soon as you receive your ATM card for security reasons,

therefore, Invitation have been extended to you to visit UBA Bank Plc for the collection of your ATM VISA CARD and the PIN NUMBER so that you can activate it by yourself and start withdrawing your funds from any ATM post there in your city, the amount you can withdraw in a day with the ATM card is $12,000 only and note that you cannot withdraw the 12,000 usd at once,you can only withdraw 2,000 usd into 6 times a day as the UBA Bank Plc programmed the ATM card making the 12,000 usd.

Alternatively, if you are unable to visit UBA Bank Plc for the collection of this your ATM VISA CARD and the PIN NUMBER, you must therefore apply for the ATM VISA CARD to be DELIVER to you via DHL courier service at your own expenses by offsetting the following payments such as;

1) Shipment fee of the ATM VISA CARD to your address cost 76.usd.
2) Insurance Coverage of the ATM VISA CARD cost 179. usd

Both payments are total sum of 255 usd need to be paid for DHL courier service to ship your ATM VISA CARD to your address.

So check yourself, Then if you cannot visit UBA Bank Plc for the collection of your ATM VISA CARD, you must therefore kindly try and send this shipment and insurance fee of 255 usd via MoneyGram Money transfer or RIA transfer with the details below, Then you let us know as soon as you send it by sending us the transfer payment information.

Use the Payment information as below to send Delivery fee 255 usd.

Receiver's Name: ANTHONY ODILU
Country: Benin
City: Cotonou
Text Question: Base
Answer: Base
Amount 255 usd only

MTCN...
SENDER....

Thanks for your good understanding and we are waiting for your quick reply with the 255 usd payment information,
Best Regards,
Rev Emmanuel Anthony

subject: Re: Our Ref: ATM /CDT/CET
body:
Hello Rev Emmanuel Anthony,

Thank you for your detailed message. It's quite exciting to hear about the ATM VISA CARD and the opportunity it presents. I must admit, I'm not very familiar with these kinds of transactions.

Could you please explain a bit more about how this ATM VISA CARD works? And why is there a limit on the amount that can be withdrawn per day?

Also, could you provide more information about the DHL courier service? How long would it take for the card to reach me if I choose this option?

I appreciate your patience in answering my questions.

Best regards.

Best wishes,
Eric
